009
010package imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear;
011
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
013
014/**
015 * This class represents a pure 2D translation (as a special case of 
016 * affine transformation).
017 * Instances are immutable and it can be assumed that every instance of
018 * this class is indeed a translation.
019 */
020public class Translation2D extends AffineMapping2D {
021
022        /**
023         * Constructor. Creates a new 2D translation mapping.
024         * @param tx translation in x
025         * @param ty translation in y
026         */
027        public Translation2D(double tx, double ty) {
028                super(1, 0, tx, 0, 1, ty);
029        }
030        
031        /**
032         * Constructor. Creates a new 2D translation mapping.
033         * @param txy translation in x/y (2-element array)
034         */
035        public Translation2D(double[] txy) {
036                this(txy[0], txy[1]);
037        }
038
039        /** 
040         * Constructor. Creates a new translation instance from a given translation.
041         * @param m a 2D translation mapping
042         */
043        public Translation2D(Translation2D m) {
044                this(m.a02, m.a12);
045        }
046        
047        /**
048         * Creates a new translation that maps between the first point
049         * to the second point specified.
050         * @param p the first point 
051         * @param q the second point
052         * @return a new translation instance
053         */
054        public static Translation2D fromPoints(Pnt2d p, Pnt2d q) {
055                return new Translation2D(q.getX() - p.getX(), q.getY() - p.getY());
056        }
057        
058        // ----------------------------------------------------------
059
060        @Override
061        public Translation2D duplicate() {
062                return new Translation2D(this);
063        }
064        
065        /**
066         * Concatenates this translation A with another translation B and returns
067         * a new translation C, such that C(x) = B(A(x)).
068         * @param B the second translation
069         * @return the concatenated translations
070         */
071        public Translation2D concat(Translation2D B) {
072                return new Translation2D(this.a02 + B.a02, this.a12 + B.a12);
073        }
074        
075        @Override
076        public Translation2D getInverse() {
077                return new Translation2D(-this.a02, -this.a12);
078        }
079
080        @Override
081        public double[][] getJacobian(Pnt2d xy) {
082                // this mapping has a constant Jacobian (indep. of xy)
083                return new double[][]
084                        {{1, 0},
085                         {0, 1}};
086        }
087}
